Metadata.title: MeshDragon - Advanced Web3D Platform
Metadata.description: Create, edit, and share stunning 3D visualizations with MeshDragon. A modern platform for today's digital creators.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We're building the future of 3D content creation, making professional-grade tools accessible to everyone.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Pushing the boundaries of what's possible in web-based 3D creation

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making professional 3D tools available to creators of all levels

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a vibrant ecosystem of creators and developers

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: A passionate group of creators and innovators dedicated to revolutionizing 3D content creation

founder.name: Mang Ugeng
founder.bio: Experienced software developer with a passion for 3D and modern web technologies. Has a vision to make 3D technology more accessible to everyone.

tech.name: Demi Dasmana
tech.bio: Expert in WebGL and 3D graphics with over 8 years of experience in developing performant web applications.

operations.name: Farhan Amirul Fikri
operations.bio: Experienced studio operations manager with expertise in project management and content strategy. Dedicated to optimizing workflow and delivering high-quality results.

design.name: Rakeu Muladi
design.bio: UI/UX designer focused on intuitive user experiences and modern aesthetics. Specialist in 3D interface design.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.
